media:group.media:title: Eons Live: An Epoch Livestream
media:group.media:description:
Our 2023 calendar is available now at https://ComplexlyCalendar.com!

For National Fossil Day October 12, 2022 the Eons team is having an "epoch" 4-hour livestream! Join us for paleontology and natural history themed games, a tour of our studio, and a Q&A with the team. The fun starts at 2:00 ET/11 PT.

---
A note from PBS: Contributors need to provide their full legal names and provide their city and state. As funders of public media programming, the names of donors will be stored by PBS and made publicly available upon request. Depending on the production budget of the individual program, donors may be acknowledged in the showâ€™s credits.
